question: Summarise the information of how instant noodles are manufactured.
text: Lately, Instant noodles have become a well-liked snack choice. The following charts represent the entire process of getting it done, moreover it reveals how this product appears on supermarket shelves. The whole procedure consists of a series of steps to make its way to grocery stores.

To start the process the flour gets shifted to storage soils and the next stage is to mix it with other ingredients. Following this, the substance is spread into sheets which are cut into strips during the fourth stage. Afterwards bunch of noodles are formed into discs. Later on, the process involves cooking  round-shaped figures into oil and getting dried. The seventh stage comprises  placing the product into the cups and adding some spices and vegetables to it. Lastly, products get wrapped into packaging and printed labels are glued onto the cups which are sealed later on.
Overall, these instant noodles are not  instant in the manufacturing course. Which demands several tidies steps and a considerably long time for a product to get to a supermarket.
